description: Reliance Jio Infocomm Limited, commonly known as Jio, is an Indian telecommunications company and a subsidiary of Jio Platforms, headquartered in Navi Mumbai. It operates a nationwide LTE network, offering 5G, 4G, and 4G+ services across all 22 telecom circles in India. Jio was soft-launched on December 27, 2015, for partners and employees, and became publicly available on September 5, 2016. It has since become the largest mobile network operator in India and the third largest globally, with over 463.78 million subscribers as of September 30, 2024. Jio's services include fixed-line telephone, mobile telephony, wireless broadband, internet services, mobile devices, and various over-the-top (OTT) services. The company is a subsidiary of Jio Platforms, which consolidates Reliance Industries' digital and telecommunications businesses.
goal: To promote Reliance Jio through audio-visual means.

description: Reliance Power is an Indian energy company that operates under the Reliance Group. It focuses on power generation and related energy projects, leveraging resources like coal, gas, solar, wind, and hydropower. Reliance Power develops, builds, and operates power plants across various regions in India. Its goal is to contribute to meeting India's growing electricity demand while diversifying its energy mix. The company has been involved in several large-scale power projects, some of which are part of India's initiative to boost infrastructure and energy availability.
goal: To promote Reliance Power through podcasts and pamphlets.

description: Reliance Gym Trainers are highly skilled fitness professionals dedicated to helping individuals achieve their health and wellness goals. They combine expertise in physical training, nutrition guidance, and motivational techniques to create personalized workout plans for clients of all fitness levels. With a focus on safety and effective results, Reliance Gym Trainers provide hands-on support, track progress, and ensure workouts are engaging and enjoyable. They specialize in diverse training styles, including strength training, cardio, yoga, and functional fitness, making them adaptable to any fitness journey. Their mission is to empower clients to lead healthier, more active lives.
goal: To promote Reliance Gym Trainers on your fitness apps.

description: Travel is the movement of people between distant geographical locations. Travel can be done by foot, bicycle, automobile, train, boat, bus, airplane, ship or other means, with or without luggage, and can be one way or round trip. Travel can also include relatively short stays between successive movements, as in the case of tourism.
goal: To promote Reliance Travels using banners on your website or ads on our webpages.

description: The automotive industry began in the 1860s with hundreds of manufacturers pioneering the horseless carriage. Early car manufacturing involved manual assembly by a human worker. The process evolved from engineers working on a stationary car, to a conveyor belt system where the car passed through multiple stations of more specialized engineers. Starting in the 1960s, robotic equipment was introduced to the process, and most cars are now mainly assembled by automated machinery.
goal: To promote Reliance Motors using podcasts and social media posts.
